faq.question: How do I book a theater?
faq.answer: You can book through our website, call us, or WhatsApp us. Choose your theater, date, time, and complete the booking.

faq.question: What is the cancellation policy?
faq.answer: You can cancel up to 72 hours before your show time and get 80% refund. Cancellations within 72 hours are not eligible for refund.

faq.question: How many people can each theater accommodate?
faq.answer: EROS (Couples): 2 people, PHILIA (Friends): 4-40 people, PRAGMA (Love): 4-8 people, STORGE (Family): 4-12 people.

faq.question: What are the available time slots?
faq.answer: We have multiple time slots throughout the day from 9:00 AM to 10:30 PM. Exact slots vary by theater and date.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept cash, UPI, credit/debit cards, and online payments. Advance booking requires payment confirmation.

faq.question: Can we bring outside food?
faq.answer: We have our own catering services. Outside food policies vary by theater. Please check with our staff.

faq.question: Do you provide decorations?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer various decoration packages for birthdays, anniversaries, proposals, and other celebrations.

faq.question: Where are you located?
faq.answer: We are located in Delhi, Dwarka. Contact us for exact address and directions.
